meanings.sent1: The tower cants slightly to the left.
meanings.sent2: She cants her head to get a better view.
meanings.sent3: The bookshelf cants forward as if eager to share its contents.
meanings.sent4: The old tree cants towards the setting sun, as if bowing in respect.
meanings.sent5: The boat cants with the waves, rocking gently back and forth.
